ai-kv10.1:1.1_0: And when the five grasping aggregates arise in them, they do so.
ai-kv10.1:1.3_0: constituent groups (of mind and body), the ten constituents (of mind and bodily form) come.
ai-kv10.1:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:1.5_0: constituent groups (of mind and body), the ten constituents (of mind and bodily form) come.
ai-kv10.1:1.6_0: It’s because of these two contacts that contacts become thinking of contact. ...
ai-kv10.1:1.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:2.1_0: the four noble truths arise in the five aggregates.
ai-kv10.1:2.3_0: Ninety constituents (of mind and body) that provide fuel for attachment.
ai-kv10.1:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:2.5_0: Ninety constituents (of mind and body) that provide fuel for attachment.
ai-kv10.1:2.6_0: It’s because of these two contacts that contacts become thinking of contact. ...
ai-kv10.1:2.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:3.1_0: And when ruined by the five grasping aggregates arise in them, what does knowledge arise?
ai-kv10.1:3.3_0: the six constituents (of mind and body), the components (of mind and bodily-form) coming.
ai-kv10.1:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:3.5_0: the six constituents (of mind and body), the components (of mind and bodily-form) coming.
ai-kv10.1:3.6_0: It’s because of these two contacts that contacts become thinking of contact. ...
ai-kv10.1:3.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:4.1_0: Yet he lies down on the fourteenth paths, when he is reborn in a battle.
ai-kv10.1:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv10.1:4.5_0: The account of the cessation is finished.
